verses.roman:
dekhite utkaṇṭhā haya, nā caḍe govardhane
kona chale gopāla āsi' utare āpane

synonyms: dekhite—to see; utkaṇṭhā haya—there was great anxiety; nā caḍe—does not go up; govardhane—on the hill known as Govardhana; kona chale—by some trick; gopāla—the Deity Gopāla; āsi'-coming; utare—descends; āpane—personally.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very anxious to see Gopāla, but He did not want to climb Govardhana Hill. Therefore by some trick the Deity Gopāla personally descended.
